languages.text: {n}Напуганный видом Кассии, беженец прикрывает лицо руками и заходится крупной дрожью.{/n} "П-простите меня за столь н-никчемные речи... Почти что на ощупь шли, по старинным картам. Молясь денно и нощно Богу-Императору, п-покуда наш кормчий прокладывал путь. Ч-чудо, чудо, не иначе, Ваша Светлость!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Напуганный видом Кассии, беженец прикрывает лицо руками и заходится крупной дрожью.{/n} "П-простите меня за столь н-никчемные речи, о благороднейшая Леди-Навигатор... Почти что на ощупь шли, по старинным картам, что сохранились на Кьява гамма. Молясь денно и нощно Богу-Императору, п-покуда наш войд-мастер прокладывал путь. Ч-чудо, чудо, не иначе, Ваша Светлость!"

languages.text: {n}Frightened by Cassia's appearance, the refugee covers his face with his hands, trembling violently.{/n} "P-please forgive my w-worthless words... We were feeling our way in the dark, you c-could say — all we had is some old maps. We prayed to the God-Emperor day and night while our helmsman plotted the course. A m-miracle, it must have been, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}!"
languages.original_text: {n}Напуганный видом Кассии, беженец прикрывает лицо руками и заходится крупной дрожью.{/n} "П-простите меня за столь н-никчемные речи... Почти что на ощупь шли, по старинным картам. Молясь денно и нощно Богу-Императору, п-покуда наш кормчий прокладывал путь. Ч-чудо, чудо, не иначе, Ваша Светлость!"

We were feeling our way in the dark, you c-could say — all we had is some old maps. We prayed to the Emperor day and night while our helmsman plotted the course. A m-miracle, it must have been, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}!"

languages.text: {n}カシアの突然の出現に難民は恐怖し、手で顔を覆いながら激しく動揺した。{/n}「し、信じてもらえないと思いますが…暗闇の中を手探りで進みました…我々は古い地図しか持っていなかったのです。神帝陛下に昼夜問わず祈り、操舵主が航路を計画しました。き、奇跡としか言いようがありません、陛下！」
languages.original_text: {n}Frightened by Cassia's appearance, the refugee covers his face with his hands, trembling violently.{/n} "P-please forgive my w-worthless words... We were feeling our way in the dark, you c-could say — all we had is some old maps. We prayed to the God-Emperor day and night while our helmsman plotted the course. A m-miracle, it must have been, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}!"

traits.locale_text: {n}カシアの突然の出現に難民は恐怖し、手で顔を覆いながら激しく動揺した。{/n}「し、信じてもらえないと思いますが…暗闇の中を手探りで進みました…我々は古い地図しか持っていなかったのです。神帝陛下に昼夜問わず祈り、操舵主が航路を計画しました。き、奇跡としか言いようがありません、陛下！」

languages.text: {n}那个难民被卡西娅的样子吓坏了。他用手捂住脸，身体剧烈地颤抖着。{/n}“请……请原谅我那些毫无价值的废话……我们在黑暗中摸索着前进，可……可以说，我们只能靠旧地图的指引。我们舵手负责绘制航线，而我们则在日日夜夜不断地向神皇祷告。大人，这一定是一个奇……奇迹！”
languages.original_text: {n}Frightened by Cassia's appearance, the refugee covers his face with his hands, trembling violently.{/n} "P-please forgive my w-worthless words... We were feeling our way in the dark, you c-could say — all we had is some old maps. We prayed to the God-Emperor day and night while our helmsman plotted the course. A m-miracle, it must have been, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}!"

traits.locale_text: {n}那个难民被卡西娅的样子吓坏了。他用手捂住脸，身体剧烈地颤抖着。{/n}“请……请原谅我那些毫无价值的废话……我们在黑暗中摸索着前进，可……可以说，我们只能靠旧地图的指引。我们舵手负责绘制航线，而我们则在日日夜夜不断地向神皇祷告。大人，这一定是一个奇……奇迹！”

languages.text: {n}El refugiado, asustado por la aparición de Cassia, se cubre la cara con las manos y tiembla visiblemente.{/n} «L-le ruego que disculpe mis f-fútiles palabras... N-nos orientamos en la oscuridad como pudimos; lo único que teníamos eran unos mapas viejos. Rezábamos al Dios Emperador día y noche mientras nuestro maestro timonel trazaba el rumbo. ¡H-habrá sido un milagro, {mf|milord|milady}!».
languages.original_text: {n}Frightened by Cassia's appearance, the refugee covers his face with his hands, trembling violently.{/n} "P-please forgive my w-worthless words... We were feeling our way in the dark, you c-could say — all we had is some old maps. We prayed to the God-Emperor day and night while our helmsman plotted the course. A m-miracle, it must have been, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}!"

traits.locale_text: {n}El refugiado, asustado por la aparición de Cassia, se cubre la cara con las manos y tiembla visiblemente.{/n} «L-le ruego que disculpe mis f-fútiles palabras... N-nos orientamos en la oscuridad como pudimos; lo único que teníamos eran unos mapas viejos. Rezábamos al Dios Emperador día y noche mientras nuestro maestro timonel trazaba el rumbo. ¡H-habrá sido un milagro, {mf|milord|milady}!».

languages.text: {n}Effrayé par l'apparence de Cassia, le réfugié se couvre le visage des deux mains et se met à trembler violemment.{/n} « P-Pitié, pardonnez mes propos s-stupides... Nous avancions à tâtons, pour ainsi dire... Nous n'avions que quelques cartes anciennes. Nous avons prié l'Empereur-Dieu jour et nuit, pendant que notre maître timonier s'occupait de nous diriger. C'est un m-miracle, tout simplement, Votre Seigneurie ! »
languages.original_text: {n}Frightened by Cassia's appearance, the refugee covers his face with his hands, trembling violently.{/n} "P-please forgive my w-worthless words... We were feeling our way in the dark, you c-could say — all we had is some old maps. We prayed to the God-Emperor day and night while our helmsman plotted the course. A m-miracle, it must have been, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Effrayé par l'apparence de Cassia, le réfugié se couvre le visage des deux mains et se met à trembler violemment.{/n} « P-Pitié, pardonnez mes propos s-stupides... Nous avancions à tâtons, pour ainsi dire... Nous n'avions que quelques cartes anciennes. Nous avons prié l'Empereur-Dieu jour et nuit, pendant que notre maître timonier s'occupait de nous diriger. C'est un m-miracle, tout simplement, Votre Seigneurie ! »

languages.text: {n}Durch Cassias Erscheinung verängstigt, bedeckt der Flüchtling sein Gesicht mit den Händen und zittert stark.{/n} "B-bitte verzeiht meine w-wertlosen Worte ... Wir erspürten unseren Weg durch die Dunkelheit, k-könnte man sagen – wir hatten nur ein paar alte Karten. Wir beteten Tag und Nacht zum Gottimperator, während unser Steuermann den Kurs festlegte. Es muss ein W-Wunder gewesen sein, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}!"
languages.original_text: {n}Frightened by Cassia's appearance, the refugee covers his face with his hands, trembling violently.{/n} "P-please forgive my w-worthless words... We were feeling our way in the dark, you c-could say — all we had is some old maps. We prayed to the God-Emperor day and night while our helmsman plotted the course. A m-miracle, it must have been, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Durch Cassias Erscheinung verängstigt, bedeckt der Flüchtling sein Gesicht mit den Händen und zittert stark.{/n} "B-bitte verzeiht meine w-wertlosen Worte ... Wir erspürten unseren Weg durch die Dunkelheit, k-könnte man sagen – wir hatten nur ein paar alte Karten. Wir beteten Tag und Nacht zum Gottimperator, während unser Steuermann den Kurs festlegte. Es muss ein W-Wunder gewesen sein, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}!"

languages.text: {n}Cassia'nın görünüşünden korkan sığınmacı, şiddetle titrerken yüzünü elleriyle kapatıyor.{/n} "Değersiz laflarımı affedin, ne olur... Karanlıkta yolumuzu bulmaya çalıştık işte, elimizde sadece eski haritalar vardı. Serdümenimiz rotayı çizerken gece gündüz demeden Tanrı İmparator'a dualar ettik. Bir mucize yaşandı {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri!"
languages.original_text: {n}Frightened by Cassia's appearance, the refugee covers his face with his hands, trembling violently.{/n} "P-please forgive my w-worthless words... We were feeling our way in the dark, you c-could say — all we had is some old maps. We prayed to the God-Emperor day and night while our helmsman plotted the course. A m-miracle, it must have been, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}!"

Karanlıkta yolumuzu bulmaya çalıştık işte, elimizde sadece eski haritalar vardı. Serdümenimiz rotayı çizerken gece gündüz demeden Tanrı İmparator'a dualar ettik.
